channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: Discuss Defence Alliance 2 and post feedback here.

item.title: New home, new forums soon.
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
Hey there everyone, we have not posted or worked on the mod for a while but for those of you that are still active we would like to mention a few things.

First, our official website is now located at Defencealliancegame.com where you can find all sorts of details about all the mods we created.

I also wanted to remind to everyone that Defence Alliance 3, while it was announced it is currently ON HOLD for various reasons. Some of them include low number of players on UT3 as well as...

New home, new forums soon.

item.title: MAC User? Hop in!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
If you are a MAC user and you want to start DA2 without using the old .sit style that comes with the ZIP package, we have prepared (thanks to SantaDuck @ www.macologist.org) a ZIP file that includes everything you will need.

Download MAC Launcher (ZIP)

Enjoy and let us know if you have any problems!

item.title: Characters.
item.author: invalid@example.com (drumzplaya13)
item.dc:creator: drumzplaya13
item.content:encoded: I was wondering what file i could look in on my computer where i could find all of the UT2004 character files, and also if there was a program that i could view them in a 3D mode. I am looking for someone to model a few original characters but for Counter Strike: Condition Zero, so i need a 3D model of the characters. If anyone knows what file i can look in and what program can i use to view them in a 3D mode, please help me. thank you.

item.title: My Birthday!

item.dc:creator: Dest
item.content:encoded: that's today

item.title: Defence Alliance 2.5 - Status Update May 15th
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dest)
item.dc:creator: Dest
item.content:encoded:
I'm sure you've heard of Defence Alliance 2.5 for Red Orchestra: Ostfront 41-45, which will be available through Steam!

Unfortunatly we cannot reveal any more information at this current stage of development.
Althought we've got our plan list pretty much done, and we already have our first concepts done by Legato. We also have Jasperr (known from TO) working on some of our models.

We are currently still looking for experienced modelers, animators, 2D artists, level designers and...

Defence Alliance 2.5 - Status Update May 15th

item.title: DA2 is dieing
item.author: invalid@example.com (veryhungryhobo)
item.dc:creator: veryhungryhobo
item.content:encoded: Today, I check the game and there was 3 servers with no people. Oh no. We should spread the news to get people. I am going to get RO people to play this fun filled game. Adios.

Have fun playing!

Defence Alliance 2 - Beta 1.5 available for download!

item.dc:creator: Teak
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys,

the german site Krawall.de featured DA as "mod of the week". Check it out

item.title: Bot Snipers - Too good ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (rich_zap)
item.dc:creator: rich_zap
item.content:encoded:
Well been playing a lot of DA2 and enjoying it a lot, however there is one thing that gets me quite annoyed. There always seems to be a large amount of bot snipers, not only are there a lot of them but they dont seem to suffer the same recoil disadvantages we do. As such when defending it is practically impossible to set up any turrets when under attack and even if they can only see the very top of your head they still seem to hit almost every time when you are standing still.

So i guess...

Bot Snipers - Too good ?

item.title: Played first online game last night
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shujaa)
item.dc:creator: Shujaa
item.content:encoded:
Last time I played this mod was early beta for the original UT. And I must say it's come a long way! A few things that caught my eye:

good points:

- awesome presentation, menus, sounds, graphics
- the mini zoom feature on some guns is brilliant, and the rocket camera is too!
- weapons feel good to use!
- gameplay is addictive... played for about an hour, was gonna do something else but had me coming back for another couple!

and the bad points:

- plasma grenades damage through walls -...

Played first online game last night

item.title: What's going on?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ReligiousZealot9)
item.dc:creator: ReligiousZealot9
item.content:encoded:
Alright, don't get misunderstand the thread title, I just made this to ask what was going on. I have read the announcements and I realize that DA2 is probably never going to be finished (all the planned ideas included, that is) and I have to say I am disappointed. I was unable to support this mod much because I happened to be attending a University that was totally against people using the internet (so many filters/limiters, it was slower than my home connection in its entirity) so I was...

What's going on?

item.title: I want servers ffs
item.author: invalid@example.com (*PRC*Kensei)
item.dc:creator: *PRC*Kensei
item.content:encoded:
people...

i can only find ONE server in the list... and it only has 3 maps...

woudl sombody PLEASE host another server... PLEASE.

item.title: Don't you hate it when...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Taehl)
item.dc:creator: Taehl
item.content:encoded:
Don't you hate it when a mod says "This is the last beta test, we're releasing the BIG NEW SHINY VERSION (that we've been teasing you with for more than a year, don't forget!) in TWO WEEKS!!!", and then make you wait for, say, 5 or 6 months without releasing or giving out any more news?

Okay, I'm not just disrespecting DA... I also hate The Specialists (HL1 mod) for the same thing... And U4ET:2k4... And...

Seriously, though. Can't a team just say "whoops, real life got in the way, sorry...

Don't you hate it when...

item.title: So its dead. face it!
item.author: invalid@example.com (FukMeHo)
item.dc:creator: FukMeHo
item.content:encoded:
I don't believe da wil get finished ever. Please face the facts, and tell its not gonna be released instead of saying for months it will be released very soon. There is no motivation whatsoever, i don't even have to check irc or something to notice that.

just face it. don't let people wait for nothing. most of them gave up anyway.

greetings

macuz, as some may know.

item.title: How to setup a DA2 server
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, just wanted to post this here to redirect you to our manual for setting up a basic DA2 server.

A quite big amount of people have requested Player Vs Bot servers, something DA2 currently supports.


Creating a DA2 Server

item.title: Beta 1.1? Why not call it Beta 2?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kharnellius)
item.dc:creator: Kharnellius
item.content:encoded:
I was just thinking...there are so many changes being implemented, that you may want to go beyond the name 1.1.

I think the sheer length of the change log should justify at least a "beta 2.0" designation.

To the outside community that will further accentuate how much has changed (which is...A LOT!), whereas, a 1.1 release sounds like a simple update and it may not draw much of a crowd.

Just a thought...

Kharn

(Keep going guys...I can't wait for the final product...

Beta 1.1? Why not call it Beta 2?

item.title: FYI: DA2 pimpage
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kharnellius)
item.dc:creator: Kharnellius
item.content:encoded:
I created a thread at Atari's forums pimping the beta of DA2 for the DA-team. (I got permission)

It can be found here...
http://ina-community.com/forums/showthread.php?t=506718

If we can sorta keep the thread alive perhaps we can get some much needed publicity to pull in more players and support.

Thanks,
Kharn

item.title: New Map and Future Versions
item.author: invalid@example.com (oti2)
item.dc:creator: oti2
item.content:encoded:
Hi all!
About a month before DA2 was released I started working on a beach assault map and currently I think it's not looking too bad but needs alot of work, but anyways, I was wondering how long it would be before vehicles are released because I'm almost done with the map and I don't want to wait for vehicles to come out before I release. But anyways, since I mentioned it I'll show you guys my map. (BTW - Personally I'm sick of seing this map so I'd really like to release it...

New Map and Future Versions
